name: Makak's Staff of Power
text:
Whenever you summon, earthshake 2. (Put two +1/+1 counter on target land you control. You may have it become a 0/0 Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land.)
{g}{g}{g}{g}{g}, {T}: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast a creature spell among them without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
